nationality.infer_reason: Inferred from local education reference ('Form 3') and residence/activities in Hong Kong (rented room, calls and arrest).

age_at_offence.source: He was 34 years old at the time of the offence.

age_at_sentencing.source: In respect of the 2nd defendant, he is now 36 years of age.

gender.source: In respect of the 2nd defendant, he is now 36 years of age. He was 34 years old at the time of the offence.

marital_status.source: He was single and worked as a hairdresser.

health_conditions.name: Long history of mental illness with multiple psychiatric admissions
health_conditions.source: In his mitigation, counsel for the 2nd defendant Mr Clement Lau informed this court that he has a long history of mental illness. He first received psychiatric treatment at the age of 11 and there were multiple psychiatric admissions to various hospitals between year 2009 to 2022.

health_conditions.name: History of drug abuse (partly contributing to psychiatric condition)
health_conditions.source: I noted from various psychiatric reports that had been submitted by counsel that indeed part of the condition of the 2nd defendant was a result of his own drug abuse. In any event, counsel informed me that he is now clear of the drug usage.

occupation.source: He was single and worked as a hairdresser.

criminal_records.source: He has a total of five criminal convictions including two convictions for the offence of possession of dangerous drug and one conviction for possession of pipe or equipment fit and intended for the consumption of dangerous drug.

family_supports.source: A total of three mitigation letters respectively prepared by the mother, a friend of the 2nd defendant and also by a pastor were submitted to urge for leniency.
